name: Ayush Kumar Pandey
bio: I am a dedicated Full Stack Developer with expertise in C++ and modern web technologies. With solid academic background and hands-on experience, I specialize in Data Structures, Algorithms, and full-stack development using MERN (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) and Next.js. I've solved over 500 problems on LeetCode and 400 on GeeksForGeeks, achieving Institute Rank 1. Passionate about creating efficient, user-friendly web applications, I continuously strive to enhance my technical and soft skills.
